/virtualbox/{uuid}/resume¶

Contents

  • /virtualbox/{uuid}/resume
    • POST /virtualbox/{uuid}/resume
      • Parameters
      • Response status codes

POST /virtualbox/{uuid}/resume¶

Resume a suspended VirtualBox VM instance

Parameters¶

  • uuid: Instance UUID

Response status codes¶

  • 400: Invalid instance UUID
  • 404: Instance doesn’t exist
  • 204: Instance resumed
